Thanks both for coming back to me with ideas!

Essentially we have a large number of deals and tickets created each day, and we want to add specific association labels to them when anything changes.
Deal/ticket creation is one way to do trigger it, but of course it doesn't catch those ones where a contact or company is added later.

Alot of our workflows are based on association label so that scheduled emails can go to, for example, one contact with 'XYZ' label on a deal that has 3 contacts associated to it.

We also add labels to tickets and companies associated to deals as well so we can see the 'type' of association, without having to track 10 different pipelines as the pipeline stages are the same but it needs to be labelled differently.

The webhook on association changes of course worked perfectly for this because i didn't need any additional fields or workflows so i'm sad i can't use it, but i'll have a look at these suggestions as I think i can make use of both ideas! Thankyou! :star:
